title: Fortune.st
author: Fortune.st
created_time: January 12, 2023, 09:22:30 PMLast edit: January 14, 2023, 08:42:38 AM by Fortune.st
content: Fortune.st is doing everything we can to serve you better. If you haven't signed up yet, now is the right time to sign up and fund your account to begin to get used to us. Signing up with us now will put you in the great position to become one of our most valued VIP with automatic upgrade once the new system is launched. Please, go over to https://fortune.st/ now and register an account, I promise you'll be glad you did. Feel free to suggest any addition you'd like to see.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: All the features mentioned are great and I believe that it will contribute greatly to the growth of Fortune.st. I sure need some clarification in the selected features below.. Quote from: Fortune.st on January 12, 2023, 09:22:30 PM1. Â  Â  Anonymity: players can enjoy their gaming experience without having to reveal any of their personal information. The current phone number field will be completely eliminated. Does this also mean that gamblers will never be asked to submit their personal informations(documents) for kyc verification?? If passing kyc verification is required in some cases, then please make this categorically clear for gamblers so we know before hand, to avoid problems in the future. Quote 3. Â  Â  No deposit required for the VIPs: players can start playing with real money without having to make a deposit. This one is really interesting, can you please explain further how this is possible, if as a vip on fortune.st, I don't have a dime on my bankroll, how do I start playing without first of all making a deposit? Would be interesting for us to know. Quote 7. Â  Â  Â Safe and secure: players can be sure that their personal and financial information is protected. This is contradictory to your number one feature which states that players can play without having to reveal their personal information.ðŸ‘€ðŸ‘€Quote 16. Â  Â No geographical restrictions: players can play from anywhere in the world. How about countries where gambling/online casinos are banned and citizens denied access to the sites, are gamblers from such a region allowed to use VPN to play on fortune.st? Quote 17. Â  Â Cryptocurrency support: players can make transactions using cryptocurrencies. Sorry but I feel this is not to even be included in the new features, as naturally, this is why you can even post on this forum, without support for cryptocurrency, there wouldn't be any need posting about fortune.st on this forum. By the way, I sometimes mistake fortune.st for fortunejack, is this two casinos related in any way?

Sorry but I feel this is not to even be included in the new features, as naturally, this is why you can even post on this forum, without support for cryptocurrency, there wouldn't be any need posting about fortune.st on this forum. By the way, I sometimes mistake fortune.st for fortunejack, is this two casinos related in any way? Thank you very much for the clear observations and interests in Fortune.st. We sincerely appreciates your comments.1. Our aim is to always be independent. We will never ask for your personal details at any time, no matter how much you are transacting as long as you are playing within our terms and conditions. We are providing services to the crypto community where anonymity is a priority. Therefore, we are positioning our business model to serve that needs 100%.3. If you register now and fund your account, you will become automatic VIP when the new system is launched. As a way of saying thank you for supporting us at early stage, you will have the privilege of playing without deposits among other benefits. More details will be made known after the upgrade.7. I mentioned safe and secure to add emphasis on how secure our platform will always be.  Already the site encryption is provided by DigiCert Inc which is one of the best in web encryption and cyber security.16. We serve the crypto community and are not geographically bound. You are free to play from any location where the site is accessible. How you access the site is entirely up to you. We are independent Anonymous Casino.17. Forgive me for that silly comment Â Fortune.st is not related or affiliated with any other casino company with similar names. We are simply the home of Fortune and not Fortune anything else.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: What's the purpose of creating an announcement thread if you are going to post another one, you should post this update on your official announcement if the content is similar, and you should know how to differentiate an official announcement and a discussion, you could be violating forum rules, and you want to have an advantage on other casinosÂ  Fortune.st Upcoming Updates (Happy New Year)

comments.author: Fortune.st
comments.body: Quote from: coin-investor on January 12, 2023, 11:35:09 PMWhat's the purpose of creating an announcement thread if you are going to post another one, you should post this update on your official announcement if the content is similar, and you should know how to differentiate an official announcement and a discussion, you could be violating forum rules, and you want to have an advantage on other casinosÂ  Fortune.st Upcoming Updates (Happy New Year) None of these threads are announcement thread. The purpose of the thread you mentioned was to inform the community about our upgrade in the works. While this thread is to discuss some of the major features we are addicting and to get more feature suggestions. ANN Thread will come in the future.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: Fortune.st on January 12, 2023, 09:22:30 PM-cut-Signing up with us now will put you in the great position to become one of our most valued VIP with automatic upgrade once the new system is launched.-cut-That's pretty vague promise. If the upgrade to VIP isn't automatic for everyone who registers now, what exact requirements do i have to fill to be in a great position to become a VIP? For example how much i need to spend or how many times i have to roll slots for it for being guaranteed vip in the future versus the new users after the new system is launched?

I think its worth trying. Other benefits includes Personalized service: Our VIP players will get dedicated account managers or customer service representative to assist with any issues or questions they may have.Invitations to special events: VIPs may be invited to exclusive events such as tournaments, prize draws, and other special promotions.Higher loyalty rewards: VIPs may earn more loyalty points for their wagers, which can be exchanged for bonuses or other rewards.Higher table limits: VIPs may be able to place higher bets on table games than regular players.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: That number 1 point you are claiming,you know that if you make that as you are promising and you will be true to withdrawals no matter what amount without you asking anything,that is going to be in your great benefit as more and more people frustrated by other casinos,not from the reputable ones but from the new comers when they win big money they are asked KYC and everything comes to a halt,all these people will gladly flock into your casino as long as you keep this only nr 1 from the top 20 things,all others are not that relevant.I hope I will not see a whale winning here and not being paid,lots of such cases from not the reputable casinos and as far as I know you are still new in this area,so we have to wait and evaluate.

comments.author: klidex
comments.body: Quote from: coin-investor on January 12, 2023, 11:35:09 PMWhat's the purpose of creating an announcement thread if you are going to post another one, you should post this update on your official announcement if the content is similar, and you should know how to differentiate an official announcement and a discussion, you could be violating forum rules, and you want to have an advantage on other casinosÂ  Fortune.st Upcoming Updates (Happy New Year) Maybe what the OP meant was that he wanted to tell about developments or improvements from the casino he was promoting.With the aim of making the users of this forum more trust and confident to use the site as their gambling platform.Actually what the OP said had good intentions even if it was solely for profit and he made a mistake where he posted in an inappropriate place.

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: If that's the list of what customers should expect from you then I'd say good luck to all of it and wishing that all of it will be delivered as promised.If you've promised #1 then you should stay consistent and true to it if that's what you've said. Anyway, are you the owner or you're one of the representative of that casino?

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: Quote from: Fortune.st on January 12, 2023, 09:22:30 PM1. Â  Â  Anonymity: players can enjoy their gaming experience without having to reveal any of their personal information. The current phone number field will be completely eliminated.When I read that I was like "No way, users can't be anonymous in a site that asks KYC"... but then I went to the TOS and they say:Players can be fully anonymous. That means, No KYC both for players and affiliates.And then I asked myself, how does a license provider allow that, and there is where I realized you don't have a gambling license. And that's bad because the full site with the servers can be sized by the police at any moment they want, so, is a high risk for the users and the house.A gambling license should be one of those 20 Things to Expect in the coming upgrade.

And that's bad because the full site with the servers can be sized by the police at any moment they want, so, is a high risk for the users and the house.A gambling license should be one of those 20 Things to Expect in the coming upgrade.Fortune.st is an independent Crypto Casino Platform with No KYC Policy. We are not bound to any jurisdiction. We believe that Cryptocurrency transactions should be fully anonymous because you're the master of your own personal data and deserve to have 100% control of it. We are focused on fairness and good customer experience. We are not one of those that hide behind bogus terms and conditions.There are number of reputable independent casino platforms who have been there for many years. We operate on similar business and operational model and working hard to be even better. We understand how the industry works and we are following the process. Our aim is to provide you only the most interesting gaming experience in open and fair matters, without any hidden agenda. We're dedicated to providing the best of Crypto Casinos, with focus on dependability, fairness, simplicity, and fast responsible gaming.
